> Hey - I bought Gladiator years and years ago, spent WAY too much time
> playing it, aquired many fond memories,

Join the club :-)

> and now I cannot find the disk. . . Where can I find it?  FSgames.com
> seems to be defunct.

You can download Openglad, the open sourced Gladiator, from
http://snowstorm.sf.net. It has some issues under Windows, but other than
that its mostly a complete port and even has good joystick support in
Linux. Openglad 0.97 has a bug with aborting levels that we havn't gotten
around to fixing yet, so you might want to grab 0.95 instead.

Alternatively, if you want the old DOS version of Gladiator (which, being
written for DOS, could have serious problems depending on your setup), you
can email Tom Ricket and as him about getting a copy of Gladiator. I
think he still has the names of everyone who registered it. Also, if you
still remember the password of the registered version, there is a
download online at http://www.geocities.com/rnbno/games/games.html , but
you need the password to exract it.

- Yan
